DOC.detailed_description: Volunteers study ask follow : 1 ) complete series questionnaires health status undergo physical screening neck make sure manipulation harmful ; 2 ) walk sock bare foot across computerized mat 3 condition - normal walk pace , walk look repeatedly ; walk look leave right repeatedly ; 3 ) one 2 manual therapy intervention neck ; 4 ) repeat walk across computerize mat 3 condition . The 2 randomly assign intervention : cervical manipulation , cervical contact . If assign manipulation , volunteer lie face train therapist move joint neck gentle , short sharp manner may produce slight 'pop ' 'click ' . If volunteer assign cervical contact , lie back trained therapist gently hold head neck 45 60 second quietly relax .
